scripts.dev:build: npm run dev:js && npm run dev:css
scripts.dev:css: node-sass --source-map-embed --follow --output-style expanded app/assets/stylesheets/application.scss | node_modules/.bin/postcss -u autoprefixer -u cssnano -o public/assets/css/main.css --map file
scripts.prod:css: node-sass --follow --output-style expanded app/assets/stylesheets/application.scss | node_modules/.bin/postcss -u autoprefixer -u cssnano -o public/assets/css/main.css
